title: tune tutor
desc: a wip app that helps you learn songs as you play along with them in real-time.
techStack: made with python, librosa, tensorflow, and qt

title: tab grabber
desc: a tool that creates sheet music from videos with them, removing the need to constantly pause to practice.

title: the deal finder
desc: a website that finds the best deals on products from a number of vendors
techStack: made with react, flask, python, selenium, and mongodb

title: idling-a-song
desc: an idle game about building a song. winner of the student summer game jam.

title: walking trainer
desc: an simulation of stickmen learning to walk using ai.

title: infinite
desc: a website that turns your motivatational quotes into poster nfts. winner of best of use of deso at hero hacks ii
techStack: made with react, python, flask, and deso

title: gazeguide
desc: a tool utilizing eye-tracking glasses to help you maintain eye contact during a conversation. made for hack the north 2023
techStack: made with python and adhawk's eye tracking glasses

title: scraballs
desc: a vr word game ultilizing eye tracking as one of its main mechanics. made for hack the north 2022
techStack: made with unity, c#, and adhawk's eye tracking vr headsets

title: finger dance!
desc: a rhythm game utilizing finger tracking as its main control system. made for hack the north 2021

title: workplace woes
desc: a resource management game about playing games during work. made for mini jam 93
techStack: made with unity, c#, and blender

title: crossy road
desc: a crossy road spinoff with different characters and mechanics
